text: // chaplc.cpp // kbyron@bmcc.cuny.edu // 3/3/19 // C program to demonstrate stack standard class #include <cmath> #include <iostream> #include <stack> using namespace std; int main() { cout<<"we will use stack functions.'"<<endl; stack<int> stack; stack.push(7) ; cout<<stack. top()<<endl; for (int 1i=0;i<7;i++) stack.push(pow(2,i)) ; while (!stack.empty()) { cout<<stack.top()<<" "; stack.pop() ; } cout<<endl; cout<< "done.'"<<endl; return 0; H
